title: Time Thieves is recruiting!
body:
Hello all, my IGN is Shogun, and I've been putting thoughts into this for awhile now, about putting a team back together again. I've been playing this game since beta, and I've ran two teams before hand, both that got into gold ranking for teams. That's in the past, now lets talk about now.

I'm looking for players who want to practice, and to learn together as a team, and willing to play a decent amount of games per day. I have an availabe schedule, so I should be on most of the day to be playing and practicing to get better. I've been playing alot of ADC and TOP recently, but those roles are still open for applications.

Currently looking for silver 2+, sorry for anyone lower.

Top: Shogun / ?
Jungle:
Mid: 3clypse/LostBast
Adc: Kinky Klinky
Support: Shogun / ?

If you're interested, the application for is:

IGN:
Availability:
Age:
Rank: 
Role applying for:
Champion Pool:
Microphone/Ts:
Why you should be chosen?:
Your one weakness?:

replies.body: Looking for junglers to play right now.

Well... I tried to make a team, I made a logo and everything for it. I went all out, but the teammates let me down, so I know what you mean. I have been there. I also hate how they rank people in Solo/duo. I am always stuck in bronze, but EVERY game I play, I come out positive. I carry every game, I am a main mid. I use zed, Leblanc, annie, ahri, kat, kassadin, and sometimes heim mid. People get so mad at me when I play because they think I am a platinum player on a smurf account. When I am really not... I just play smart. I even win against champions that counter my champ. It's all about playing smart.

Reason why I want a new team: I am tired of looking, I am tired of losing because of my teammates being toxic and/or trolls. I want to take this game seriously. I am a gamer. And that's what a gamer is supposed to do.

Proof: You may check all of my match histories. Look at my K/D. Or you could just try me out and I am 100% positive that you will like my game play. Put me up against the best of the best. And the game will be ended in a Victory by me.

IGN: Lemony
After this current game, looking for jungler tryouts.
Bump! Adc position has been filled as of currently. Still looking for tryouts that'll be happening today.

IGN: ScaryKillerN
Availability: Weekdays 6-9PM EST, Weekends whenever.
Age: 17
Role applying for: Support/ADC
Champion Pool: All supports/Caitlyn, Jinx, Lucian, Corki, Kog'maw, Sivir 
Microphone/Ts: Yes 
Why you should be chosen?: I have previous ranked 5's experience, I've played on teams that compete again Platinum+ players and have been on teams that are in Gold, the teams always end up disbanded so it's a rather annoying experience. Looking for a team that will stay committed.
Your one weakness?: Sometimes go aggressive when adc doesn't want to, to early in the game.

IGN: Jadarina
Availability: 6pm-3AM everyday. Sunday/Wednesday all day
Age: 27
Role applying for: MId/Top/Adc/Support
Champion Pool: you name em I play em except rek haven't played her much yet.
Microphone/Ts: Yes
Why you should be chosen?: Same as you been on since beta played with a few teams want to put together a good squad to actually do something while playing this game.
Your one weakness?:  I never surrender...

Monday: 7-10

weekends:free

Champion Pool:{{champion:104}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:67}}

Why you should be chosen?:because im a good  team player looking to get involved  in the community and just really wanna get better
Your one weakness?: still working on kiting (im decent at it)

IGN: abigmacs4life
Availability: All weekend, Monday - Friday, 0030 - 0500
Age: 21
Role applying for: Top lane
Champion Pool: Vlad, Jax, Gnar, Renek, Ryze, Nid, honestly damn near any top bruiser.
Microphone/Ts: Both
Why you should be chosen?: Been playing since season 1, am getting tired of same old bs in solo/duo que. Wanting something more out of this game.
Your one weakness?: Ahri, she is such a hottie.

IGN: Hisuki Nguyen
Availability: (pst time) :  Monday/wed 3 pm to 11 pm , Tuesday/thus 1 pm to 11 pm. Fri/sat/Sunday mostly all day

1. Champion Pool: renekton , jarvan,jax,garen,akali,Darius,pantheon,Leblanc,fizz,zed,rye,malachite

Why you should be chosen?:  your choice
Your one weakness? Less experience than my opponent may be.

IGN:foxbox
Availability: i am available most the time
Age:16
Role applying for: Mid
Champion Pool: zed, swain, kat, orianna, azir
Microphone/Ts: yus
Why you should be chosen?: I pay attention and i am a good shotcaller
Your one weakness?: earlyish game warding, like first 5 min

IGN: 3clypse
Availability: More on weekends, but can play on weekdays later
Age: 17
Role applying for: Mid
Champion Pool: TF, Akali, Yasuo, Talon, Zed, Xerath, Ahri, Kassadin
Microphone/Ts: Yup
Why you should be chosen?: I pay attention and respect calls, will learn new champions if i need to, and accept good criticism
Your one weakness?: I usually play lane overly passively, being a TF main and all, also I play TF much more than other champions

Heya Shogun!

I would definitely like to try out for you! I've been playing since season 2 now and I want to get involved and play for a ranked team to improve as a player!!

IGN: LostBast
Availability: EST timezone evenings (6p.m. or later).
Age: 21
Role applying for: Mid
Champion Pool: {{champion:1}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:101}} 
Microphone/Ts: Yes!
Why you should be chosen?: I love playing the game and really want to take it to the next level. I'm a team-player and I can keep a cool head, I never surrender, nor do I cry.
Your one weakness?: Maintaining high cs throughout the entire game (tends to fall off midgame), though I am actively working on improving it.

I look forward to receive a response in game!

-LB

IGN: SuperSport SS2
Availability: Whenever
Age:25
Role applying for: Support
Champion Pool: nami, morg, braum, sona, can play most champs competently
Microphone/Ts: have everything there is
Why you should be chosen?: Been a part of serious team before, been playing a long time, looking for a serious team
Your one weakness?: need a bit better positioning in early lane phase, good outside of early laning

note: currently silver 5 (silver 3 last season placed in bronze 4, already climbed out)
